ModMetaData.name: Rimworld++ Addon 2.0
ModMetaData.author: Qwynn | Dr Zhivago
ModMetaData.description: Applies various fixes and tweaks to some of the mods in the Rimworld++ 2.0 collection. This is not a standalone mod, and you will encounter errors on load up if you enable this without the entire Rimworld++ 2.0 collection. (Version 1.0)
